La Traviata [unknown arranger]
Newtongrange, Midlothian Promoted by the Midlothian Brass Band League. March contest "Energico": 1. Musselburgh, 2. Polton, 3 divided. Penicuik and Newtongrange. 6 bands competed
Aug. 14, 2013, 12:36 p.m. June 17, 2018, 8:26 p.m.
1 Musselburgh & Fisherrow Trades Thomas Moore
2 Bonnyrigg and District Edward Sutton
2 Polton Mills Richard Marsden
4 West Calder Public Band James Prentice
5 Newtongrange Band Friend Farrand
6 Penicuik Silver Thomas Moore
